law.text: Subject to KRS 362.437, the partnership agreement may grant to all or a specified group of the limited partners the right to vote, with or without the concurrence of the general partners, on a per capita or any other basis on any matter and may make any appropriate provision for the exercise of such voting right.
law.history: Repeal the prior repeal contained in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, which was to have been effective January 1, 2008, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 180, effective June 26, 2007. -- Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, effective January 1, 2008. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 284, sec. 18, effective July 15, 1988.
